block.p: PREDMESKY-Byrdie. Beloved wife of Rabbi Akiba Predmesky of blessed memory. Loving mother of Shulamith (Joel) Cohn. Adored bubby of Yossi, Rena, Eli, Leora, Tani, Yehuda & Betzalel. Kvurah in Israel. Shiva will begin Sunday morning.

PREDMESKY - Byrdie. SAR Academy mourns the loss of the cherished mother of Shulamit and Rabbi Joel Cohn, principal of SAR. May the entire family find comfort among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem, Jack C. Bendheim, President
